title: Active to passive voice conversion
objective: To learn conversion of sentence from active voice to passive voice.
learningOutcome: Student will able to learn about the conversion of sentence from active voice to passive voice.
act1: In this activity, we are going to learn about the conversion of sentence from active voice to passive voice.
act2: Understand the structure of the active voice and passive voice sentences.
act3: Click on "VERIFY" to verify the converted sentence.
act4: The pop-up will show the result along with the explanation.
instr1: Convert active voice to passive voice.
instr2: Select the desired tense from the dropdown.
instr3: The sentence displayed is in active voice.
instr4: Corresponding passive voice sentence is given in the form of disarranged words below.
instr5: Now, rearrange the given words below to construct the corresponding passive voice of the given sentence.
instr7: Click on "VERIFY" to check whether the passive voice is properly constructed.
instr8: Click on "NEXT" to view the next sentence.
q_instr2: The quiz will start after clicking on the "OK" button, along with a timer.
q_instr3: To select an option as an answer to a given question, click on it.
q_instr4: You will get two attempts to select the correct option to the question.
q_instr5: You may skip the question if you want.
q_instr6: The score and timing are displayed on the top of the screen throughout the quiz.
q_instr7: You will get +1 for each correct answer. There is no negative marking.
q_instr8: The scorecard will be generated at the end of the quiz.
proc2: The sentence displayed is in the active voice.
proc3: Now, rearrange the given words below to construct the corresponding Passive voice of the given sentence.
proc5: Click on "Check" to check whether the Passive voice is properly constructed and check the feedback displayed below.
proc6: Click on "Next" to view the next sentence.
proc7: If you are unable to solve the question, click on “Show answer” to see the answer, but “Show answer” it is visible only if you answer it thrice incorrectly.
wawgtl: What are we going to learn?
aysywtq: Are you sure you want to quit?
Ministry: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology || Ministry of Education
